mapper.select: SELECT /* RelectCheckDuplicateTime */ SCH_ID AS "scheduleID" , "day" AS "scheduleDay" , SEQNO AS "seqNo" , TCH_ID AS "teacherID" , SUB_ID AS "subjectID" , RM_ID AS "roomID" , STA_TIME AS "startTime" , END_TIME AS "endTime" FROM FRST.SCHED_DETAIL WHERE SCH_ID = #{scheduleID} AND "day" = #{scheduleDay}

SELECT /* SelectCheckDuplicateTeacher */ A."year" AS "scheduleYear" , B.SCH_ID AS "scheduleID" , C.CLS_ID AS "classID" , C.C_YEAR AS "classYear" , C.SEMESTER AS "semester" , C.CLS_INFO_ID AS "classInfoID" , B."day" AS "scheduleDay" , B.SEQNO AS "seqNo" , B.TCH_ID AS "teacherID" , B.SUB_ID AS "subjectID" , B.RM_ID AS "roomID" , B.STA_TIME AS "startTime" , B.END_TIME AS "endTime" FROM FRST.SCHED_INFO A JOIN FRST.SCHED_DETAIL B ON A.SCH_ID = B.SCH_ID JOIN FRST.CLS_INFO C ON C.CLS_INFO_ID = A.CLS_INFO_ID WHERE A."year" = #{scheduleYear} AND C.C_YEAR = #{classYear} AND C.SEMESTER = #{semester} AND B.TCH_ID = #{teacherID} AND ('' = #{departmentID} OR C.DEPT_ID = #{departmentID})
mapper.insert: INSERT /* RegisterScheduleDetail */ INTO FRST.SCHED_DETAIL ( SCH_ID , "day" , SEQNO , TCH_ID , SUB_ID , RM_ID , STA_TIME , END_TIME , STCD , FRST_REG_DT , FRST_REG_TIME , LAST_CHNG_DT , LAST_CHNG_TIME) VALUES ( #{scheduleID} , #{scheduleDay} , #{seqNo} , COALESCE(#{teacherID}, '') , COALESCE(#{subjectID}, '') , COALESCE(#{roomID}, '') , COALESCE(#{startTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{endTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{statusCode}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{firstRegisterTime}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, '') , COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, ''))
mapper.update: UPDATE /* UpdateSubjectInformation */ FRST.SUBJ_INFO SET SUB_NM = COALESCE(#{subjectName}, SUB_NM) , SUB_DESC = COALESCE(#{subjectDesc}, SUB_DESC) , STCD = COALESCE(#{statusCode}, STCD) , LAST_CHNG_DT = COALESCE(#{lastChangeDate}, LAST_CHNG_DT) , LAST_CHNG_TIME = COALESCE(#{lastChangeTime}, LAST_CHNG_TIME) WHERE CLS_ID = #{classID} AND SUB_ID = #{subjectID}
